title: nAnenum paTrillA
sahitya:
nAnenum paTrillA mOni avan nAna vikAramillA jnAni


anupallavi

  Unuyir uDalinai vAnularanginai ODum paDa shuruLin nATakamenak-kaNDE


caraNam    mOsam pOghAdulagil muTrilum vizhittavan mUDu mantiramillA muttan parishuddhan
AshiyAl alaiyAda Anandap-poighaiyil arivannam pOlavE ADi aruL kUDiyE
